wf_workflow_version.description: (Re)join a conference call by either incoming or outgoing phone call
wf_workflow_version.name: Nexmo Call Join
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_workflow.description: (Re)join a conference call by either incoming or outgoing phone call
wf_workflow.name: Nexmo Call Join

wf_condition.name: Press 1 to accept and join the call

sys_variable_value.value: You will now be joined into the conference call.
en-US
You will now be joined into the conference call.
en-US

wf_condition.name: Please enter the code of the conference call to join and press hash to finish

sys_variable_value.value: You will now be disconnected. Good bye.
en-US
You will now be disconnected. Good bye.
en-US
direction=inbound^EQ
direction=inbound^EQ
The code you entered is not valid.
en-US
The code you entered is not valid.
en-US

wf_activity.name: Set up scratchpad data for outbound call

activity.display_value: Set up scratchpad data for outbound call

sys_variable_value.value: ${conference.voice_message}.
en-US
${conference.voice_message}.
en-US

Please enter the code of the conference call to join and press hash to finish
